name: Paint The Darkness
description:
Submission for the Unreal Engine 2020 Spring Game Jam

Team Name: Lone Wolf Mode

Game Name: Paint The Darkness

Game Description: All of our senses dictate the way we move through our world. In this case you shoot light photons to illuminate what is considered pitch black, in order to find your way to the ultimate light source.

Controls - For keyboard and Xbox gamepad

Mouse XY or Right Thumbstick - Look around

AWSD or Left Thumbstick - Move

Space or Right Trigger Axis - Jump

Q-E or Left Shoulder-Right Shoulder - Change Color

Mouse LMB or Left Trigger Axis - Shoot

Everything is better explained in-game.

List of Pre-Jam Assets

  • MUSIC 'Ibn Al-Noor by Kevin MacLeod'
  • Everything else is custom made. Enjoy!
